alert.note: Alert for Boulder (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:00PM MDT until June 12 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOULDER COUNTY... At 100 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boulder, or 25 miles northwest of Denver, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters in Boulder have reported quarter sized hail and accumulating hail. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Hail may accumulate on roadways causing hazardous travel. Locations impacted include... Boulder, Louisville and Eldorado Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
